summary: REAR AXLE SEAL WAS LEAKING. WHEN REPAIRING THE SEAL, THE MECHANIC SAW THE BRAKE CALIPER WAS HITTING THE SUSPENSION BOLT. WHEN THE BRAKES WERE APPLIED THE CALIPER PUSHED THE ROTOR AND HUB OUT WHICH CAUSED THE SEAL TO LEAK. THE AXLE COULD FAIL. A MONACO CORP. MECHANIC SAID TO RELOCATE THE CALIPER TO THE REAR OF THE ROTOR. THIS SOLVED THE PROBLEM. *TR
